devdoc.details: This contract should be deployed uniquely per network, in a non-upgradeable way.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

FailedCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

params.approved: True for an approval, false for a disapproval.
params.forwarder: The account approved or disapproved as forwarder.
params.nonce: The `sender`'s account nonce before the approval change.
params.sender: The account for which `forwarder` is approved or disapproved.
params.target: The target contract approved or disapproved as forwarder.

approveAndForward(bytes,bool,address,byt.details: Reverts with {InvalidEIP1271Signature} if `isEIP1271Signature` is true and the signature is reported invalid by the `sender` contract.Reverts with {WrongSigner} if `isEIP1271Signature` is false and `sender` is not the actual signer.Emits a {ForwarderApproval} event.

params.data: The content of the call (the `sender` address will be appended to it according to EIP-2771).
params.isEIP1271Signature: True if `sender` is a contract that provides authorization via EIP-1271.
params.signature: Signature by `sender` for approving the forwarder.
params.target: The destination of the call (that will receive the meta-transaction).

forward(address,bytes).details: Reverts with {ForwarderNotApproved} if the caller has not been previously approved as a forwarder by the sender.

params.data: The content of the call (the `sender` address will be appended to it according to EIP-2771).
params.target: The destination of the call (that will receive the meta-transaction).

returns.nonce: The current nonce for the `sender`/`forwarder`/`target` tuple.

returns._0: True if `forwarder` is an approved meta-transaction forwarder for `sender` to `target`, false otherwise.
True if `forwarder` is trusted, false if not.

setForwarderApproval(address,address,add.details: Reverts with {InvalidEIP1271Signature} if `isEIP1271Signature` is true and the signature is reported invalid by the `sender` contract.Reverts with {WrongSigner} if `isEIP1271Signature` is false and `sender` is not the actual signer.Emits a {ForwarderApproval} event.

params.approved: Whether to approve or disapprove the forwarder.
params.forwarder: The address of the forwarder to change the approval of.
params.isEIP1271Signature: True if `sender` is a contract that provides authorization via EIP-1271.
params.sender: The address which signed the approval of the approval.
params.target: The target contract to change the approval of.

params.forwarder: The address of the forwarder to change the approval of.

devdoc.title: Meta-Transactions Forwarder Registry.

ForwarderApproval(address,address,addres.notice: Emitted when a forwarder is approved or disapproved.

approveAndForward(bytes,bool,address,byt.notice: Approves the forwarder and forwards the meta-transaction using EIP-2771.

getNonce(address,address,address).notice: Gets the current nonce for the sender/forwarder pair.

isApprovedForwarder(address,address,addr.notice: Checks whether an account is as an approved meta-transaction forwarder for a sender account to a target contract.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Checks whether a forwarder is trusted.

setForwarderApproval(address,address,add.notice: Approves or disapproves a forwarder using a signature.

setForwarderApproval(address,address,boo.notice: Approves or disapproves a forwarder for the sender.

userdoc.notice: Users can allow specific EIP-2771 forwarders to forward meta-transactions on their behalf, per target contract.
